_comment: VS Code MCP configuration for the Hedera Agent Kit.
Add this to your VS Code settings (settings.json) under the MCP extension's server configuration,
or place in .vscode/mcp.json if your MCP extension supports project-level config.
Replace <PATH_TO_HEDERA_AGENT_KIT> with the absolute path to your cloned hedera-agent-kit-js repo.
Replace 0.0.XXXXX and 302e... with your Hedera account ID and DER-encoded private key.
To switch to mainnet, change --ledger-id=testnet to --ledger-id=mainnet.
